object.name: Gift
object.description: This object represents a gift that can be sent by the bot.
object.html_description: This object represents a gift that can be sent by the bot.
object.rst_description: This object represents a gift that can be sent by the bot.

annotations.description: The sticker that represents the gift
annotations.rst_description: The sticker that represents the gift
annotations.name: sticker

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the sticker
annotations.html_description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the sticker
annotations.rst_description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the sticker
annotations.name: star_count

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to upgrade the gift to a unique one
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to upgrade the gift to a unique one
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to upgrade the gift to a unique one
annotations.name: upgrade_star_count

annotations.description: The total number of the gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The total number of the gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The total number of the gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only
annotations.name: total_count

annotations.description: The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only
annotations.name: remaining_count
